metaData.title: Hello World
metaData.description: How to write our first Hello World.

pageProps.content:
# Hello World.

How to print "Hello World" in multiple programming languages.

```sample
{
    "type": "sample",
    "items": [
        {
            "lang": "c",
            "type": "code",
            "value": "// Code\n#include <stdio.h>\nint main() {\n   printf(\"Hello, World!\");\n   return 0;\n}",
            "meta": null,
            "label": "C"
        },
        {
            "lang": "c++",
            "type": "code",
            "value": "// CODE\n#include <iostream>\n\nint main() {\n    std::cout << \"Hello World!\";\n    return 0;\n}",
            "meta": null,
            "label": "C++"
        },
        {
            "lang": "python",
            "type": "code",
            "value": "# CODE\nprint(\"Hello World\")",
            "meta": null,
            "label": "Python"
        },
        {
            "lang": "java",
            "type": "code",
            "value": "// CODE\npublic static void main(String[] args){\n    System.out.println(\"Hello World\");\n}",
            "meta": null,
            "label": "Java"
        }
    ]
}
```
